DSS Display Instance ID's

#define VPS_DISP_INST_DSS_VID1   (0U)
 Video Pipeline 1 display driver instance number.
 
#define VPS_DISP_INST_DSS_VID2   (1U)
 Video Pipeline 2 display driver instance number.
 
#define VPS_DISP_INST_DSS_VID3   (2U)
 Video Pipeline 3 display driver instance number. This instance is not available for Tda3xx platform.
 
#define VPS_DISP_INST_DSS_GFX1   (3U)
 Graphics Pipeline 1 display driver instance number.
 

Detailed Description

This modules define APIs to display video data using DSS in VPS.
